name: Map Grabber
tagline: Fetch OpenStreetMap streets and buildings for an address; export PNG, SVG, GeoPackage, or DXF for CAD/Rhino.
description: Get site base maps from OpenStreetMap: provide an address or place name, receive street network and optional building footprints. Export as PNG (for Telegram or preview), SVG, GeoPackage, or DXF for use in CAD or Rhino. Uses osmnx.
